name: Manipulate
description:
Manipulate is a third person platformer where you use time to move objects and solve puzzles. You play as Grier, a time wizard living in the world of Meridia, tasked with watching over time. One morning, he overslept and lost track of time! With no time to waste, Grier must find all the hours of the day to bring time back to normal. Discover a vibrant world filled with ancient structures and aquatic creatures and have them aid you in your quest.

Created By:
Alanna Tangjerd
Anthony Seeha
Brandon Turner
Kimberly Coleman
Zach Luther

Music By:
Anthony Seeha
